parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire tread separation can lead to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially result in fatalities, especially when traveling at high speeds.
symptoms: tire not properly attached to sidewall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire interference with the inner panel can cause tire damage, leading to a blowout, loss of vehicle control, and accidents.
symptoms: Tires rub against the inner panel

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure Due to Manufacturing Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure due to manufacturing defects can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities, especially when traveling at high speeds.
symptoms: tire not properly attached to sidewall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air brake system can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
Electrical issues with the brake controller can cause the brakes to malfunction, leading to accidents or loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Heater Pressure Relief Valve Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water heater pressure relief valve can lead to a sudden release of hot water and steam, causing scalding injuries, property damage, and potentially starting a fire.
symptoms: Water heater leaking or spraying hot water
steam venting from the water heater
loud noises or hissing sounds from the water heater
pressure relief valve stuck or malfunctioning.
